EntryName	PLPP7_HUMAN
ProteinName	Inactive phospholipid phosphatase 7 (Phosphatidic acid phosphatase type 2 domain-containing protein 3)
GeneName	PLPP7 C9orf67 PPAPDC3
Length	271
Function	Plays a role as negative regulator of myoblast differentiation, in part through effects on MTOR signaling. Has no detectable enzymatic activity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus envelope; Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Membrane
